name: monoscript
description: Monorepo with Typescript, Express, Vite, Tailwind, Shadcn

scripts.build:shared: cd shared && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:client: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:server: cd server && npm install && npm run build
scripts.deploy: npm run build:shared && npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix shared"  "npm run dev --prefix server" "npm run dev --prefix client"
